channel.title: How to make monster unagressive(dont attack you)
channel.description:
Hey guys, how do i make it so the monsters dont fight back? or unagressive??
The reason I ask this, is becuase i make a pk point system, and under killerz i added, killerz.addItem(6532,1000) so they get 1000 tokkuls a kill, but when an npc kills you, you also get 1000 tokkuls, how do i fix?
-Will

item.title: How to make monster unagressive(dont attack you)
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

I have no idea, But how i would find it is.
Get the Npc Id search your client.java, or anything else it could be in.
until you find something along the lines of npcattacking

Read full topic
item.source: How to make monster unagressive(dont attack you)

item.title: How to make monster unagressive(dont attack you)

item.description:
@BubbleScape_x wrote:

Just remove the attacking code that makes the npc attack.
